text.0: Climate change is a real and urgent issue. It is a disservice to this planet and its inhabitants that animal agriculture is severely underrepresented in the discussion on climate change. In fact, adopting a vegan lifestyle is considered to be the single biggest way in which an individual can reduce his/her negative impact on the environment. Find out more about the effects of animal agriculture on global warming by watching Cowspiracy: The Sustainability Secret.
text.1: You can also watch Cowspiracy on Netflix!
